name: Edo
description: Crisp, gentle, and easy drinking from a rice malt base, this lager has floral and herbal notes, finishing dry and refreshingly smooth.

name: Samo
description: Pours pale gold with subtle bread aromas, balanced by floral and spicy notes and a touch of lemon zest.

name: Rein
description: Refreshing smooth malt backbone with fruit notes and floral aroma.

name: Vindobona
description: Hints of caramel and biscuit, balanced by mild earthy hops, a crisp medium-light body, and a clean, dry finish.

name: Phokas
description: Tropical and citrusy with hints of pine and white grape. Light, juicy, and easy-drinking.

name: DDH Taupō
description: Double dry hopped with Wakatu™, Riwaka™, Citra®, Simcoe®

name: DDH Akko
description: Double dry hopped with Mega Motueka™,Nelson Sauvin™, Citra®, Galaxy®
hops: Mega Motueka, Nelson Sauvin™, Citra®, Galaxy®

name: Double Prismatic
description: Tangerine zest, pineapple, raspberry, and lemongrass.

name: Rubico
description: Pineapple, peach rings, bubblegum, strawberry and citrus.
